<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Energy Absorption](/Spells.aspx?ID=528)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 407 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An effect would deal acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage to you.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 15 to acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage from the triggering effect (one type of your choice). The resistance applies only to the triggering effect's initial damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Energy Absorption
